Title: Relates to providing proof of general commercial liability insurance
Summary: Requires an applicant to provide the full general commercial liability insurance policy and calls for the department to review such policy and ensure it does not include any prohibited exclusions and complies with applicable law.
LawCode: Amd ยง28-401.9, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing proof of general commercial liability insurance
